class chaos_game.ChaosGame2dBase[source]¶

Base class for all 2d chaos game.

x¶

x coordinates.

y¶

y coordinates.

vectors¶

Vectors of outline of the polygon.

vertex¶

Points of vertexes of the polygon.

polygon¶

Polygon object of the polygon.

initial_point¶

Initial seed point of a chaos game.

add_virtual_vertex(option)[source]¶

Adds virtual vertexes to current point_b.

Adds virtual vertexes (eg. allow point in the middle the square to count as a point_b).

Options:

Add point_b in the center of the point_b -> 0

Add vertexes in between all of the vertexes -> 1

Parameters

option – What type of point_b to add. Refer above.

generate_heatmap(show=True, save='', colormap: <module 'matplotlib.cm' from '/Users/rinzewatanabe/Documents/fractals/venv/lib/python3.8/site-packages/matplotlib/cm.py'> = <matplotlib.colors.LinearSegmentedColormap object>, sigma=2) → <module 'matplotlib.pyplot' from '/Users/rinzewatanabe/Documents/fractals/venv/lib/python3.8/site-packages/matplotlib/pyplot.py'>[source]¶

Generates heatmap graph from the coordinates.

Parameters

  • show – To show or not.

  • save – To save or not.

  • colormap – Type of Matplotlib colormap to use.

  • sigma – Sigma to use. Higher sigma creates an intense graph.

Returns: Generated plot.

Generates a scatter plot from coordinates.

Parameters

  • show_vertexes – If the vertexes is shown or not.

  • show – To show or not.

  • save – To save or not.

  • size – Size of each point.

Returns: Generated plot.

class chaos_game.ChaosGameRegularPolygon(polygon)[source]¶

Chaos game with regular point_b base.

chaos_game(iteration, factor, absolute=False)[source]¶

Performs chaos game.

Parameters

  • iteration – Number of iterations.

  • factor – Multiplication factor.

  • absolute – If absolute or not.

chaos_game_restricted(iteration, factor, restriction, absolute=False)[source]¶

A restricted version of the 2d chaos game.

Restrictions:

Currently chosen cannot be chosen -> 0

Vertex cannot be two places away -> 1

currently chosen vertex cannot neighbor the previously chosen vertex if the two previously chosen vertices are the same -> 2

Current vertex cannot be one place away (anti-clockwise) from the previously chosen vertex -> 3

Parameters

  • iteration – Number of iterations.

  • factor – Multiplication factor.

  • restriction – Restriction number as listed above.

  • absolute – If absolute or not.

Parameters

  • vertex – Target vertex.

chaos_game.rotate_around_point(origin, point, angle)[source]¶

Rotates a point around a point.

Refer to https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rotation_matrix.

Parameters

  • origin – Point which we want to rotate around.

  • point – Point which we want to rotate.
